title: Virginia falls to UNC
text: Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Virginia falls to UNC Despite Taquan Mizzell's 117 yards rushing on the ground, the Cavs didn't have enough against the Heels and lost 26-13.
